name: Matte iPhone Mockups - 2021 Updated
description:
About

This started as a personal project for me a few years back when I posted to Behance. Until then there has been a series of newer iPhones released, therefore I decided to update this project to include all 5 official models:


  • iPhone SE
  • iPhone X, Xs, XR
  • iPhone 11, 11 Pro
  • iPhone 12, 12 Pro
  • iPhone 13, 13 Pro


Created in Figma, For Figma users. üìê

These mockups were made from scratch in Figma to support components and variants. Just choose the iPhone model, then pick a color from a list of official color presets in the variants menu.


Also, since these mockups are vectorized, you can resize it to your heart‚Äôs content, as long as you keep the scale ratio.



Not enough phone colors? Make your own instead. üé®

Looking to paint the phone to a certain color that matches your graphics or background? Got you covered. Just go look for a certain layer name [Change this color] and let your creativity runs free.
